entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQL Server: Support large JSON string properties (>4000) #29477
  • Add a generic overload of ConventionSetBuilder.Remove #29476
  • Change connection interception tests to not depend on Dispose events #29473
  • InvalidOperationException: Cannot save changes for an entity in state 'Unchanged' #29472
  • why there is no SqliteDateDiffFunctionsTranslator #29471

Closed

  • GroupBy() Min() Limitations #29455
  • Will the new JSON columns be compatible with existing string columns that contain JSON? #29451
  • ManyServiceProvidersCreatedWarning #29412
  • AsSplitQuery for specified collection #29411
  • Method not found: 'Void Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Update.IUpdateEntry.SetStoreGeneratedValue(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IProperty, System.Object)'. in call method _dbContext.SaveChangesAsync() in efCore 7.0.0-rc.2.22472.11 #29410
  • Baffling query generation with .Include and multiple conditions #29398
  • Package manager frozen and unable to stop #29465

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29475
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29474
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [release/2.1] Add CodeQL3000 run to efcore-ci-official #29440
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding to 2.1.39 #29437
  • [release/3.1] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29434
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29435
    Servicing-approved
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29468
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29469
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Query: Use type mapping from IDbFunction while translating (#27995) #29216
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.12
  • Update issue templates #29470
    auto-merge
  • [release/6.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to efcore-ci-official #29439
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to efcore-ci-official #29438
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29433
